page.title: 08Recreation--Denny & Dunipace
page.content: YOUNG PEOPLE. Local schools provide some sports facilities for pupils. Football, netball and swimming are popular.After school children attend various{clubs;}Girl Guides, Brownies, Boy Scouts and Cubs. Many do Karate. Some girls train to be Majorettes but boys prefer to cycle. Jogging and cycling are popular with {adults}of both sexes. Women enjoy {knitting,}baking, gardening and sewing. Many like{Bingo.}Men play golf but tend to watch football. They like gardening, bowling and photography. Quite a number of older men keep {Doocots}so pigeon racing takes place. Most adults enjoy visiting a pub for a drink and chat on a night-out. Denny has a{Curling Club}founded in 1830. Nowadays curlers can play indoors. By far the most popular pastime with all age groups is watching{television.
